txt.en: Iothete is in his hut in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete.
Instance: The Story of a Strange Stone
Listen to Iothete
'I will tell you everything I remember, [placeholder]. You will wish me dead when you hear what I did to Wildermore.'
Iothete is in his hut in the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete.
'I will tell you everything I remember, [placeholder]. You will wish me dead when you hear what I did to Wildermore.'
Iothete is in the woods of the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete and listen to his memory of a fateful day.

Iothete's voice paints a picture in your mind of his walk on the fateful day a year or so ago.\n\nThe woods of the Whitshaws feel very different than the bare white tines protruding from the snow today.
Iothete is in the woods of the Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete and listen to his memory of a fateful day.
'Yes... do come rest at my home. We can discuss whatever you'd like.'
Iothete is in the woods in the northern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete.

Iothete concludes his tale:

'The memory is strange, foggy, unsettling. I do not feel like I was there -- merely looking on from a distance while I spoke too much of things that do not concern strangers.

'I told my neighbours, but they dismissed me as being mad. The stone terrified me. It made me cold.

'So I left.

'Now it is cold everywhere, and it is my fault.'
Iothete is in the woods in the northern Whitshaws.\n\nYou should speak with Iothete.

'And now you see what the stone has wrought? The cold came over our lands not long ago, and it was as unnatural as this stone that froze my home a year ago.\n\n'Is it my fault? Is it because I told him so much?'
You should follow Iothete's memory into his home in Dunfast.
You should follow Iothete's memory into his home in Dunfast.
You should follow Iothete's memory into his home in Dunfast.
You should follow Iothete's memory into his home in Dunfast.
Iothete remembers walking in the green woods of the Whitshaws
An old man stands ahead
Listen to Iothete
Iothete remembers being entranced by the old traveller at once
Listen to Iothete's tale
Iothete remembers sitting for a long while with the old wanderer
Listen to Iothete's tale
'He wanted to know everything about Wildermore. I do not know why...'
Follow Iothete
'And that was when he placed the stone exactly where you found it. The cold came instantly! I was so afraid...'
Talk to Iothete
Listen to Iothete
Listen to Iothete's memory
Talk to Iothete
Listen to Iothete's memory
The fragment of stone you recovered from Iothete's home has a story behind it, and you are ready to hear it.
Iothete remembers walking in the green woods of the Whitshaws
